pages.text: In the midst of the battle slicing around we can find the slayers. Brutal warriors who kill anyone in sight. With their heavy weapons they will easily rip you apart.

pages.title: Passive Abilities
pages.text: $(li) +15% Attack Damage done: Any melee damage done gains 1.15 x AttackDamage = NewAttackDamage. This stacks with other damage change attributes such as strength effects. $(li) 10% Piercing damage: Any total damage done will add piercing damage worth of 0.1 x TotalDamage. Piercing damage ignores armor.
$(li) +15% More projectile damage taken: Any damage from projectiles gets the following calculation 1.15 x ProjectileDamageIncome = NewProjectileDamageIncome.
